title: Bug 6125: JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When pressing finish in the JAR packager, it reports 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'.
OB: The JAR packager reports 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors' when pressing finish.
EB: The JAR packager should not report 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors' when pressing finish.
SR:
1. Make changes to a file without saving.
2. Open the JAR packager for the project containing the modified file.
3. Enter all the required information in the JAR packager, including the path, destination, and name of the JAR packager.
4. Press the finish button and ensure that the JAR packager does not display the error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'.
